00021 
00022 #ifndef _CELSTATLISTENER_H_
00023 #define _CELSTATLISTENER_H_
00024 
00025 #include "chipstream/CelListener.h"
00026 #include "chipstream/CumulativeStats.h"
00027 //
00028 
00029 /** 
00030  * Class for objects that need to actually access real cel file data.
00031  */
00032 class CelStatListener : public CelListener, public ChipSummary {
00033 
00034 public:
00035 
00036   /** Constructor. */
00037   CelStatListener(std::map<std::string,std::vector<bool> > &masks) {
00038 
00039       std::map<std::string, std::vector<bool> >::iterator iter;
00040 
00041       for(iter=masks.begin(); iter != masks.end(); iter++) {
00042         addProbeMask(iter->first, iter->second);
00043       }
00044 
00045   }
00046 
00047   /** Virtual class, virtual destructor */
00048   virtual ~CelStatListener() {}
00049   
00050   /** 
00051    * Cel file of data.
00052    *
00053    * @param cel - Handle to an open cel phone.
00054    */
00055   virtual void newChip(affymetrix_fusion_io::FusionCELData *cel) {
00056     std::vector<std::vector<bool> >::iterator maskIx;
00057     std::vector<CumulativeStats<double> > chipStats(m_ProbeMasks.size());
00058     calcStats(m_ProbeMasks, cel, chipStats);
00059 
00060     std::vector<ChipSummary::Metric> metrics;
00061     for(size_t i = 0; i<chipStats.size(); i++) {
00062         metrics.push_back(ChipSummary::Metric(m_MaskNames[i] + "_mean",chipStats[i].getMean()));
00063     }
00064     m_SummaryStats.push_back(metrics);
00065     setValid(true);
00066   }
00067 
00068 private:
00069 
00070   /** 
00071    * Add a new probe subset via a mask associated with identifier name.
00072    *
00073    * @param name - string identifier associated with this mask (i.e. "all", "pm")
00074    * @param mask - bit mask with probes to calculate stats for set to true.
00075    */
00076   void addProbeMask(const std::string &name, const std::vector<bool> &mask) {
00077     m_MaskNames.push_back(name);
00078     m_ProbeMasks.push_back(mask);
00079     declareMetric(name + "_mean",ChipSummary::Metric::Double);
00080   }
00081 
00082   /** 
00083    * Loop though an open cel file and fill in the statistics for each
00084    * probe subset.
00085    * 
00086    * @param masks - Different probe subsets to calculate stats for.
00087    * @param cel - Cel file to get data from.
00088    * @param chipStats - Vector to fill in with stats for each mask.
00089    */
00090   void calcStats(const std::vector<std::vector<bool> > &masks, 
00091                  affymetrix_fusion_io::FusionCELData *cel,
00092                  std::vector<CumulativeStats<double> > &chipStats) {
00093     assert(chipStats.size() == masks.size());
00094     int numCells = cel->GetNumCells();
00095     /* Get each entry in a cel file and then add it to different masks
00096        as appropriate. */
00097     for(int probeIx = 0; probeIx < numCells; probeIx++) {
00098       std::vector<std::vector<bool> >::const_iterator maskIx;
00099       std::vector<CumulativeStats<double> >::iterator statIx;
00100       float intensity = cel->GetIntensity(probeIx);
00101       /* Check all the masks to see if they include this data point. */
00102       for(maskIx = masks.begin(), statIx = chipStats.begin(); 
00103           maskIx != masks.end() && statIx != chipStats.end(); 
00104           maskIx++, statIx++) {
00105         if(*(maskIx->begin() + probeIx) == true) {
00106           statIx->addData(intensity);
00107         }
00108       }
00109     }
00110   }
00111   
00112 private:
00113   /// The individual identifiers for particular subsets of probes.
00114   std::vector<std::string>  m_MaskNames;
00115   /// Subsets of probes in the form of bit masks.
00116   std::vector<std::vector<bool> > m_ProbeMasks;
00117 };
00118 
00119 #endif /* _CELSTATLISTENER_H_ */
